console.log("Ticket Counter:", counter.toString());
const counter = await ticketNFT.ticketCounter();
const ticketNFT = await TicketNFT.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
const TicketNFT = await ethers.getContractFactory("TicketNFT");
const counter = await ticketNFT.ticketCounter();
const ticketNFT = await TicketNFT.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
const TicketNFT = await ethers.getContractFactory("TicketNFT");
console.log("Ticket Counter:", counter.toString());
const counter = await ticketNFT.ticketCounter();
// Check the ticket counter (it should be 0 initially)
const ticketNFT = await TicketNFT.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3"); // Replace with your contract address
const TicketNFT = await ethers.getContractFactory("TicketNFT");
